{"id":1478283734,"question_id":2800,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1734149829,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1478283734/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum String Length After Removing Substrings","memory":"11.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minLength(string s) {\n        //\"AB\" or \"CD\"\n        stack<char> st;\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++) {\n            char c = s[i];\n            if(st.empty()) {\n                st.push(c);\n                continue;\n            };\n            if(c=='B' && st.top() == 'A')\n                st.pop();\n            else if(c=='D' && st.top() == 'C')\n                st.pop();\n            else\n                st.push(c);\n        };\n        return st.size();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-string-length-after-removing-substrings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
